question:
You are a code expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate and professional responses. User Agreement

**I. General Provisions**

1. Before registering and using the service, users should carefully read this agreement to ensure they fully understand all terms. Unless you accept all terms of this agreement, you have no right to register, log in, or use the services covered by this agreement. Your registration, login, use, and other actions will be considered unconditional acceptance of all terms in this agreement.

2. Unless otherwise explicitly specified, any new features or services launched by this product shall unconditionally be subject to this agreement.

3. Our company reserves the right to modify the terms of this agreement at any time without notice. After our company modifies the agreement terms, if you do not accept the modified terms, please immediately stop using the services provided by this product. Continued use of the services provided by this product will be considered acceptance of the modified agreement.

**II. User Registration**

1. Users should agree to all terms of this agreement and complete the entire registration process according to the page prompts (minors should complete this with their legal guardian). When users click the "Next" button during the registration process, it indicates complete acceptance of all terms of this agreement.

2. Users need to register an account for this product before using this service. The product account should be registered with a mobile phone number. Please use a mobile phone number that has not been bound to a product account and has not been banned by this product according to this agreement. This product may change the methods of account registration and binding according to user needs or product requirements without prior notice to users.

3. Users must ensure the authenticity of all information required for service business during the use of this product's services. If problems arise due to inaccurate information, and the consequences resulting from these problems, our company bears no responsibility.

4. When users register and use this product, we will collect personal information that can identify users so that the system can contact users when necessary or provide users with a better experience. Information collected by the system includes but is not limited to user's gender, age, date of birth, city of residence; the system agrees that the use of this information will be constrained by the protection of users' personal privacy information.

**III. Service Content**

1. The specific content of this service is provided by this product according to actual circumstances, including but not limited to users using this product. The product may change the services provided, and the content of services provided by this product may change at any time. Users will receive notification about service changes.

2. Unless otherwise explicitly stated in this agreement, new products, new features, and new services launched by our company are all regulated by the terms of this agreement.

**IV. Service Changes, Interruptions, or Termination**

1. Given the special nature of network services (including but not limited to server stability issues, malicious network attacks, and other uncontrollable circumstances), users agree that our company has the right to interrupt or terminate part or all of the services at any time.

2. Our company needs to regularly or irregularly inspect or maintain the systems or related equipment that provide services. If such circumstances cause service interruption within a reasonable time, our company does not need to bear any responsibility.

3. If any of the following situations occur, our company has the right to change, interrupt, or terminate the services provided to users under this agreement at any time without any responsibility to users or any third party:
   * According to legal regulations, users should submit true information, but the personal information provided by users is not authentic, or inconsistent with the registration information without providing reasonable proof;
   * Users violate relevant laws and regulations or the provisions of this agreement;
   * According to legal regulations or requirements of authorized agencies;
   * For security reasons or other necessary circumstances.

**V. User Personal Privacy Information Protection**

1. In accordance with legal regulations, we will collect, use, and disclose your personal information in specific situations. The following terms describe how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information.

2. Information Collection
   * User provided: We will save information you directly provide. For example: We will record your registration information, customer service requests, or other communication records with us. Types of recorded information include: avatar, nickname, gender, date of birth, region, and other information you choose to provide. We collect, use, and disclose personal information to provide services to you through creating accounts, identifying users, responding to inquiries and emails, etc.
   * Automatic collection: When you contact or use our services, we will automatically collect your information including: Log information (we record all log information when you use the service, including browser information, time of use, browsed web pages, IP address, and sources). We use various technologies to record information, including but not limited to: placing Cookies on your mobile device. Cookies are small data packets stored on your hardware, used to help us improve service quality and your user experience, understand which areas and functions are popular, and count traffic, etc.

**VI. Content Standards**

1. The content referred to in this standard is any content created, uploaded, copied, published, or distributed by users during the use of this service, including but not limited to account avatars, names, personalized signatures and other registration information and verification materials, or text, voice, pictures, graphics, sent messages, replies, and related linked pages, as well as other content generated by using this product account or service.

2. Users pledge that when using this product's services, they must comply with relevant laws and regulations of the People's Republic of China, and must not use this product's services to create, upload, copy, publish, or distribute the following content:
   * Content opposing the basic principles established by the constitution;
   * Content endangering national security, leaking state secrets, subverting state power, or undermining national unity;
   * Content harming national honor and interests;
   * Content inciting ethnic hatred, ethnic discrimination, or undermining national unity;
   * Content undermining national religious policies or promoting cults and feudal superstitions;
   * Content spreading rumors, disrupting social order, or undermining social stability;
   * Content spreading obscenity, pornography, gambling, violence, murder, terror, or abetting crime;
   * Content insulting or defaming others, or infringing upon others' legitimate rights and interests;
   * Content containing other information prohibited by laws and administrative regulations.

3. Users must not use this product account or service to create, upload, copy, publish, or distribute the following content that interferes with the normal operation of this product or infringes on the rights and interests of other users or third-party partners:
   * Content containing any sexual implications;
   * Content containing insults, intimidation, or threats;
   * Content containing harassment, spam, malicious information, or deceptive information;
   * Content involving others' privacy, personal information, or data;
   * Content containing other interference with the normal operation of this service or infringing on the legitimate rights and interests of other users or third parties.

**VII. Usage Rules**

1. Any content transmitted or published by users in or through this service does not reflect or represent, nor should it be deemed to reflect or represent, the views, positions, or policies of our company. Our company bears no responsibility for this.

2. When using this product, users must comply with the provisions of relevant laws and regulations of the People's Republic of China, and agree not to use this product for any illegal or improper activities, including but not limited to the following actions:
   * Interfering with or destroying relevant services, or any servers or networks connected to relevant services, or any policies, requirements, or regulations related to relevant services;
   * Collecting and storing personal information about any other users for use in any prohibited activities;
   * Intentionally or unintentionally violating any relevant Chinese laws, regulations, rules, ordinances, or other norms with legal effect.

3. Users are fully responsible for the truthfulness, legality, harmlessness, accuracy, and validity of the information transmitted using this product account or service. Any legal responsibility related to the information disseminated by users shall be borne by the users themselves and has nothing to do with our company. If this causes damage to our company or third parties, users should provide compensation according to law.

4. The services provided by this product may include advertisements. Users agree to display advertisements provided by this product and third-party suppliers and partners during use. Except as explicitly stipulated by laws and regulations, users should be responsible for transactions made based on such advertisement information. Our company bears no responsibility for transactions made by users based on such advertisement information or content provided by the aforementioned advertisers, or losses or damages suffered.

5. To use this product, users must provide their own equipment necessary for accessing the international internet, including computers, mobile phones, and other devices related to accessing the international internet, and pay fees related to this service themselves.

**VIII. Disclaimer**

1. For content transmitted through this product service, our company does not guarantee the correctness, completeness, or quality of the aforementioned content. When accepting relevant services, users may encounter content that is unpleasant, inappropriate, or objectionable. Under no circumstances will our company be responsible for any content, including but not limited to any errors or omissions in any content and any loss or damage derived from them. Users' use of the above content shall be at their own risk.

2. Users expressly agree that the risks and consequences of using this product will be entirely borne by themselves, and our company bears no responsibility to users. If users cause losses to any other third party due to violation of relevant laws, regulations, or any terms under this agreement, users agree to bear the resulting damage compensation liability.

3. Our company respects and protects users' personal privacy rights. However, in cases of malicious network attacks and other uncontrollable circumstances leading to the leakage of users' privacy information, users agree that our company bears no responsibility.

4. Our company bears no responsibility for losses caused by telecommunication system or internet network failures, computer failures, computer system problems, or any other force majeure reasons, but will strive to minimize the losses and impacts caused to users.

**IX. Intellectual Property Statement**

1. Any text, graphics, audio, video, and software (including but not limited to graphics, animations, audio, video, interface design, data, programs, code, documentation) included in this product service or other information or materials are protected by copyright law, trademark law, and other laws and regulations. Without written consent from the relevant rights holders, users may not use such information or materials in any way.

2. This agreement does not grant users the right to use any trademarks, service marks, logos, domain names, and other distinctive brand features of this product. No one may use them without authorization (including but not limited to: illegally copying, distributing, displaying, mirroring, uploading, downloading). Otherwise, our company will pursue legal responsibility according to law.

3. Except as explicitly allowed by this agreement, users may not modify, rent, lease, lend, sell, distribute, reproduce, create derivative works, or use any part or all of the content of this product for any commercial purpose in any form or by any means.

**X. Applicable Law**

1. The conclusion, execution, interpretation of this agreement and resolution of disputes shall be governed by Chinese law and under the jurisdiction of Chinese courts. If any part of the service terms conflicts with the laws of the People's Republic of China, then that part of the terms should be reinterpreted according to legal regulations. The invalidity or reinterpretation of partial terms does not affect the legal effect of the remaining terms.

2. Users and our company unanimously agree to this agreement. If disputes arise during the implementation of this agreement, both parties should resolve them through friendly negotiation; if negotiation fails, either party may directly file a lawsuit with the local people's court.

**XI. Other Provisions**

1. The titles in this agreement are for convenience only and should be ignored when interpreting this agreement.

2. The right to modify and the final interpretation of this agreement belongs to our company.

checklist.title: User Registration Compliance Analysis
checklist.description: Check whether the user registration section covers all necessary legal requirements and protections for both users and the company.Evaluate if the registration process includes age verification mechanisms, clear consent indicators, mobile verification logic, and information accuracy requirements. Deduct 3 points if any key registration safeguard is missing, 2 points if consent confirmation is ambiguous, and 3 points if minor registration handling is incomplete. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Privacy Policy Implementation Analysis
checklist.description: Examine the privacy policy section for compliance with modern data protection regulations and transparency requirements.Review whether the agreement clearly states what personal data is collected, how it's used, stored, and shared. Check for clear opt-out mechanisms, data retention policies, and breach notification procedures. Deduct 3 points for each missing essential privacy element (data collection scope, usage purpose, sharing limitations), 2 points for vague data retention policies, and 5 points if user rights to access/delete data aren't mentioned. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Content Standards and Prohibited Activities Definition
checklist.description: Analyze how thoroughly the agreement defines acceptable content and prohibited user activities.Evaluate whether the agreement comprehensively covers prohibited content categories (illegal content, harmful content, intellectual property violations) and includes examples for clarity. Check if enforcement mechanisms and penalties for violations are clearly defined. Deduct 3 points if prohibited content categories are insufficiently defined, 2 points if enforcement mechanisms are unclear, and 5 points if potential penalties aren't specified. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Service Changes and Termination Procedures
checklist.description: Assess whether the agreement adequately addresses service modifications, interruptions, and termination scenarios.Review if the agreement clearly defines circumstances for service changes or termination, notification requirements to users, and what happens to user data after termination. Deduct 3 points if termination notification procedures are missing, 3 points if data handling after termination is unclear, and 4 points if force majeure provisions are insufficiently detailed. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Code Robustness
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code can handle common abnormal situations and provide friendly error prompts or recovery mechanisms.Code with strong robustness should be able to effectively handle edge cases, giving 10 points. If the robustness is average, give 5 points, and if no exceptions are handled, give 0 points.

checklist.title: Innovative Features
checklist.description: Check whether the code includes surprise features that enhance the experience.Add 3 points for each practical innovative feature implemented (maximum 10 points).

checklist.title: Redundant Features
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: redundant implementation of similar functions, unrelated function modules, and fancy effects that affect performance.Deduct 3 points for each redundancy found, and directly deduct 10 points if the core functions are interfered with by redundant code.

checklist.title: Legal Compliance and Jurisdiction
checklist.description: Assess whether the agreement properly addresses legal frameworks, dispute resolution mechanisms, and jurisdictional issues.Review if the agreement specifies governing law, jurisdiction for disputes, arbitration or litigation procedures, and international considerations if applicable. Deduct 3 points if governing law is ambiguous, 3 points if dispute resolution mechanisms are incomplete, and 4 points if international jurisdictional considerations are missing where relevant. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Interface Vision Design Standards
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the overall design follows modern design principles: harmonious color matching, proper layout spacing, and professional font system.Deduct 3 points for each crowded visual element, 5 points for a glaring color combination, and 5 points for chaotic text-image layout. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Clarity, Accessibility and Readability
checklist.description: Evaluate how accessible and understandable the agreement is for average users, considering complex legal language and document structure.Check if the agreement uses plain language explanations alongside legal terms, includes section summaries, proper formatting with headings/subheadings, and visual elements to enhance understanding. Deduct 3 points for excessive legal jargon without explanations, 3 points for poor document structure, and 4 points for lack of emphasis on critical terms. The full score is 10 points.
